entities.name: plump blonde witch

relationships.description: The front row is where people are sitting and reading the Daily Prophet.
The warlock clanged like a bell every time he moved.
The witches and wizards were using Umbridge’s clipboards to make notes.
The emblem on their chests was a wand and bone, crossed.
Mr. Weasley called to the plump blonde witch over the renewed clanging of the warlock in the corner.
The Healers were helping the warlock.
